actions.name: Tidal Rush
actions.description: Effect: While the user meets the [Intrepid 3/4] Condition, all of the user's Water-Type attacks gain [Priority 1], or have their [Priority X] increased by 1. This only works on attacks whose type is originally Water-Type.

system.description: Effect: While the user meets the [Intrepid 3/4] Condition, all of the user's Water-Type attacks gain [Priority 1], or have their [Priority X] increased by 1. This only works on attacks whose type is originally Water-Type.
